projects.title: Secure E-commerce Backend API
projects.description: A highly scalable, secure, and production-ready RESTful API for an e-commerce platform with automated AWS deployment and comprehensive CI/CD pipeline.
features: RESTful API design with comprehensive CRUD operations
Secure authentication using JWT and bcrypt
AWS serverless deployment with Lambda and API Gateway
Automated CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
90%+ test coverage with Jest and Supertest

projects.title: Real-time Collaborative Mind Map Editor
projects.description: A full-stack application enabling multiple users to simultaneously create and edit mind maps in real-time using WebSockets and React.
features: Responsive React frontend with intuitive UI

projects.title: Distributed Event Management Platform
projects.description: A microservices-based system demonstrating event-driven architecture, inter-service communication, and independent deployment strategies.
features: Independent CI/CD pipelines for each service
Circuit breaker pattern for fault tolerance

items.name: ALX Software Engineering Program
items.description: Comprehensive full-stack development program covering low-level programming (C), algorithms, data structures, system design, and collaborative development.
items.keyLearnings: Applied principles of efficient algorithm design and data structures in backend projects, utilized collaborative development workflows for team-based development.
items.relevance: Foundation for all backend development projects and understanding of computer science fundamentals.

items.name: ALX ProDev
items.description: Advanced software development practices and professional development skills program.
items.keyLearnings: Enhanced understanding of professional software development practices and project management methodologies.
items.relevance: Critical in managing the complexity of microservices architecture and distributed systems projects.

items.name: Open Source Society University (OSSU) Computer Science Curriculum
items.description: Self-directed comprehensive computer science curriculum covering discrete mathematics, algorithms, operating systems, networking, and databases.
items.keyLearnings: Strong theoretical foundation in computer science fundamentals, including operating systems, networking, and database theory.
items.relevance: Instrumental in designing scalable architectures and understanding containerization and cloud infrastructure.

items.name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
items.description: Fundamental understanding of AWS cloud concepts, services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.
items.keyLearnings: Comprehensive knowledge of AWS core services, cloud computing concepts, and best practices for cloud deployment.
items.relevance: Foundational knowledge for deploying and managing resources in AWS for all cloud-based projects.

items.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect â€“ Associate
items.description: Advanced certification covering design of distributed systems, highly available, scalable, fault-tolerant, and cost-effective applications on AWS.
items.keyLearnings: Deep understanding of AWS services including EC2, S3, RDS, VPC, Load Balancers, Auto Scaling, and architectural best practices.
items.relevance: Directly applied architectural best practices and service selection knowledge to design robust and scalable AWS infrastructure for production applications.

items.name: Software Architecture
items.description: Principles of software architecture, architectural patterns, quality attributes (scalability, security, maintainability), and architectural documentation.
items.keyLearnings: Understanding of architectural patterns, quality attributes, and design principles for large-scale systems.
items.relevance: Informed architectural decisions and design patterns used in microservices projects, ensuring modular and scalable system design.

items.name: Design Patterns & Object-Oriented Design
items.description: Fundamental design patterns (Factory, Singleton, Observer), SOLID principles, and object-oriented analysis and design.
items.keyLearnings: Mastery of design patterns, SOLID principles, and object-oriented programming concepts.
items.relevance: Implemented various design patterns (Repository, Strategy) in backend projects to enhance code reusability and maintainability.

items.name: Secure Coding
items.description: Common vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10), secure coding practices, threat modeling, defensive programming, and secure authentication/authorization.
items.keyLearnings: Comprehensive understanding of web security vulnerabilities and secure coding practices.
items.relevance: Integrated secure coding practices and OWASP Top 10 mitigation techniques into all API projects, ensuring robust protection against common web vulnerabilities.

items.name: DevOps
items.description: DevOps principles, CI/CD pipelines, automation, infrastructure as code, monitoring, and collaboration between development and operations.
items.keyLearnings: Understanding of DevOps culture, practices, and tools for continuous integration and deployment.
items.relevance: Directly informed the design and implementation of CI/CD pipelines and Infrastructure as Code practices, streamlining deployment workflows.

blog.title: Scaling Node.js APIs in 2025
blog.excerpt: Strategies for handling high traffic with Node.js and AWS.

blog.title: Secure API Design
blog.excerpt: Implementing OWASP best practices in RESTful APIs.
